function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 epidemic","Impact":"Overwhelming healthcare systems, causing high mortality rates and economic damage","Mitigation":"Implementation of rigorous public health measures, mass vaccination, and international cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, the elderly, and immunocompromised individuals","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through droplet and close contact","Impact":"Widespread community transmission and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Promoting mask-wearing, social distancing, and hand hygiene, and limiting public gatherings","Technologies":"Face masks, hand sanitizers, and contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, employers, and individuals"},{"Description":"Risk of contamination through bodily fluids and transmission through oral or conjunctival routes","Impact":"Greater risk of transmission through different exposure routes, leading to increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Research on transmission routes, promoting eye protection and minimizing exposure to bodily fluids","Technologies":"Protective eyewear, research on transmission dynamics, and development of safety protocols","People":"Healthcare workers, laboratory staff, and individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and healthcare facilities"}]}
